item.title: Replacing T4 Templates with plain C# 11
item.description: Replacing T4 Templates with plain C# 11 Generating files with T4 In Arc-Enabled Servers we have a quite a lot of different config files which need to be mostly the same, but a little different for each region we deploy into. For example, we have values that are used by Helm charts for each region: Australia East configmap: Environment: Prod Location: "australiaeast" CloudEnvironment: "Public" UseKeyVault: true ... Brazil South configmap: Environment: Prod Location: "brazilsouth" CloudEnvironment: "Public" UseKeyVault: true .
